## SentEthersBeraBorrowTransaction class

A transaction that has already been sent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SentEthersBeraBorrowTransaction<T = unknown> implements SentBeraBorrowTransaction<EthersTransactionResponse, BeraBorrowReceipt<EthersTransactionReceipt, T>> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [SentBeraBorrowTransaction](./lib-base.sentberaborrowtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersTransactionResponse](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionresponse.md)<!-- -->, [BeraBorrowReceipt](./lib-base.beraborrowreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersTransactionReceipt](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, T&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Returned by [SendableEthersBeraBorrow](./lib-ethers.sendableethersberaborrow.md) functions.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `SentEthersBeraBorrowTransaction` class.
